Admission Details info.fee: Approx. ₹700-₹1500, depending on the course and application process.
Admission Details info.documents:
JEE Main scorecard (for B.Tech).
Mark sheets (10th & 12th).
Bachelor's degree certificates (for PG courses).
Transfer and migration certificates.
Caste and income certificates (if applicable).
Recent passport-sized photographs.
Admission Details info.institutionName: Geetanjali Institute of Technical Studies, Udaipur
Admission Details info.coursesOffered:
Undergraduate:
1. B.Tech in Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering.
Postgraduate:
1. M.Tech in Computer Science Engineering, Digital Communication, Power Systems, Industrial Engineering & Management
2. MBA
3. MCA
Admission Details info.eligibility:
For B.Tech:
1. 10+2 with Physics, Mathematics, and Chemistry/Computer Science with 45% marks (General Category) or 40% (Reserved Category).
2. Admission based on JEE Main scores and REAP counseling.

For M.Tech:
1. Bachelor's degree in a relevant field with 55% marks (General Category).
2. Admission through Centralized Admission for M.Tech (CAM).

For MBA/MCA:
1. Bachelor's degree with 50% marks (General Category) or 45% (Reserved Category).
2. Admission based on RMCAAP or state-level entrance.
Admission Details info.procedure:
Register on REAP/RMCAAP/CAM portals (as applicable).
Fill in personal details and upload documents.
Pay the application fee.
Participate in the counseling process and seat allotment.
Confirm admission and pay fees at the college.

4.	Fee payment and confirmation of admission.
